效能: ContrlL®Spectrum is comprised of the following  ampule configurations.Level：with low pH,high pCO2 and low pO2 values, high electrolytes(Na+,K+,Ca++,Cl-), high lactate,high glucose and high hemoglobin values.Level 2：with values for pH,pCO2, pO2 ,Na+,K+,Ca++,Cl-,lactate glucose,THb,O2Hb,COHb,MetHb and RHb within the reference range for clinically normal subjects.Level 3：with high pH, low pCO2 values,elevated pO2,low electrolytes (Na+,K+,Ca++,Cl-),low lactatem low glucose and low hemoglobin values.
醫器主類別一: A臨床化學及臨床毒理學用裝置
申請商地址: 台北市中山區敬業一路１６０號７樓
